body_html: On second thought, I think this is the expected behavior -- seemed unintuitive though because the batching is done by grouping elements of a series of tuples, rather than grouping the series of tuples where each tuple is a row in the output 'batch tensor'.

body: On second thought, I think this is the expected behavior -- seemed unintuitive though because the batching is done by grouping elements of a series of tuples, rather than grouping the series of tuples where each tuple is a row in the output 'batch tensor'.
